ygData.subject: Re: pets
ygData.msgSnippet: When your skill in conjuring goes up, it costs less to cast pet spells. Also, it costs less to cast spells (and they cast faster) if you have a higher
ygData.messageBody:
When your skill in conjuring goes up, it costs less to cast pet spells.
Also, it costs less to cast spells (and they cast faster) if you have a
higher chanelling. So perhaps you simply raised your channeling and/or your
conjuration skill as you fought at level nine. Just my two cents =)

Masters
aka: Yinlaar, Dark Elf Necromancer
Rallos Zek
----- Original Message -----
From: Robert Porter <frog42@...>
To: <shadowknight@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, May 20, 1999 5:38 PM
Subject: [shadowknight] pets


> From: Robert Porter <frog42@...>
>
> I'm a level 11 DEF, but at level 9, I was very upset I couldn't cast my
pet. about 3/4 way through level 9 I tried it just for fun, and to my
surprise, I was able to cast it. Anyone know why I would suddenly be able
to do this?
>
> Kakarot
>
